snippet: The president said he was nominating the acting director of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives, B. Todd Jones, to lead the agency on a permanent basis.
abstract: Pres Obama says he is nominating B Todd Jones, acting director of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives, to lead the agency on a permanent basis.
lead_paragraph: The president said he was nominating the acting director of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives, B. Todd Jones, to lead the agency on a permanent basis.

headline.seo: Obama Urges Senate to Confirm Todd Jones as A.T.F. Director
headline.main: Obama Tells Senate That It’s Time to Confirm A.T.F. Director
headline.print_headline: Obama Tells Senate That It’s Time to Confirm A.T.F. Director

keywords.value: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
keywords.name: organizations
